sources.title: Accomplice (1946)
sources.description: Richard Arlen, Veda Ann Borg Based on the novel Simon Lash, Private Detective by Frank Gruber

metadata.Plot: Private detective Simon Lash and his assistant Eddie Slocum are hired by Joyce Bonniwell to find her missing husband Jim Bonniwell. They learn from Mr. Springer, president of the bank where Bonniwell worked, that a woman named Evelyn Price is mixed up in the case. Following up on a call from Sheriff Rucker, Joyce and Simon go to Palmdale and Joyce identifies the body of a murdered man as her husband. Simon, following up the lead of the mysterious woman, goes to Mesa, New Mexico and finds the mystery woman to be Joyce and her husband very much alive.
metadata.Actors: Richard Arlen, Veda Ann Borg, Tom Dugan
